name: BlayzBloo: Super Melee Brawlers Battle Royale
name_original: BlayzBloo: Super Melee Brawlers Battle Royale
description:
BlayzBloo: Super Melee Brawlers Battle Royale is an arcade-fighting game developed by Arc System Works. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Aksys Games.
You can play BlayzBloo: Super Melee Brawlers Battle Royale on Nintendo DS.
